detail_desc: Fitted top in soft, airy jersey made from a stretch cotton blend with long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif and tassels in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fine-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline in a relaxed fit. Low dropped shoulders with shiny metal press-studs, slightly wider sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, leggings, all-in-one pyjamas, a T-shirt and a hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with a wide foldover waistband, elasticated heels and full feet. Pyjamas with an all-over print, press-studs down the front and at the crotch, elasticated heels and full feet. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and lapped shoulders. Hat with an appliqué on the front.
Shorts in a textured cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a press-stud.
Shorts in a textured cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a press-stud.
Short shorts in a cotton weave with embroidery, an elasticated waist and scalloped broderie anglaise trims at the hems.
Short shorts in a cotton weave with embroidery, an elasticated waist and scalloped broderie anglaise trims at the hems.
Short shorts in a cotton weave with embroidery, an elasticated waist and scalloped broderie anglaise trims at the hems.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with a wide elasticated trim at the top. Wide, embroidered flounce at the top with a scalloped edge. Elasticated hem.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with a wide elasticated trim at the top. Wide, embroidered flounce at the top with a scalloped edge. Elasticated hem.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with a wide elasticated trim at the top. Wide, embroidered flounce at the top with a scalloped edge. Elasticated hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jumper in cable-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in a cotton knit with a lined hood with a decorative drawstring, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton. Hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton. Hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton. Hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton. Hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, low-rise, skinny-fit jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and super-skinny legs.
5-pocket, low-rise, skinny-fit jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and super-skinny legs.
Pencil case in shimmering imitation leather with a zip at the top. Unlined. Size 5x6x20 cm.
Double-breasted pea coat in a felted wool blend with wide notch lapels, concealed pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.

Short, lightly padded parka in washed cotton twill with a collar with a detachable faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Chest pockets and front pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, a concealed drawstring at the waist and hem, and a tab with a hook and loop fastener at the cuffs. Lined.

Short, lightly padded parka in washed cotton twill with a collar with a detachable faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Chest pockets and front pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, a concealed drawstring at the waist and hem, and a tab with a hook and loop fastener at the cuffs. Lined.

Short, lightly padded parka in washed cotton twill with a collar with a detachable faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Chest pockets and front pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, a concealed drawstring at the waist and hem, and a tab with a hook and loop fastener at the cuffs. Lined.
Trenchcoat in a soft weave with a small stand-up collar, lapels at the front and a double-layered yoke. Long, raglan sleeves, welt side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Trenchcoat in a soft weave with a small stand-up collar, lapels at the front and a double-layered yoke. Long, raglan sleeves, welt side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Fitted, quilted, lightweight jacket with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers. Supplied with a practical storage bag with an elasticated drawstring. Size of bag 11x24.5 cm.

Fitted, quilted, lightweight jacket with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers. Supplied with a practical storage bag with an elasticated drawstring. Size of bag 11x24.5 cm.

Fitted, quilted, lightweight jacket with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers. Supplied with a practical storage bag with an elasticated drawstring. Size of bag 11x24.5 cm.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a sheen. Hood with a faux fur lining and adjustable tab with a metal fastener at the back, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Diagonal handwarmer pockets, flap side pockets with a press-stud, inner ribbing at the cuffs, and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a sheen. Hood with a faux fur lining and adjustable tab with a metal fastener at the back, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Diagonal handwarmer pockets, flap side pockets with a press-stud, inner ribbing at the cuffs, and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Short-style padded jacket with a stand-up collar, hood with a faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap down the front. Chest pockets with a press-stud, diagonal side pockets with a flap and press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Coat in an Italian wool blend with a large detachable faux fur collar and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, welt side pockets and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is partly recycled.
Long dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with sewn-on ties that can be wound around several times. Unlined.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in pima cotton jersey. T-shirt with a round neck and button placket. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake fly.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and flared legs with raw-edge hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and flared legs with raw-edge hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and flared legs with raw-edge hems.

Set with a T-shirt in soft jersey and leggings in superstretch denim. T-shirt with a print motif and a gently rounded hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
One-shoulder blouse in a cotton and linen pattern weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top.
Sleeveless blouse in plumeti chiffon with a V-neck, a double-layer front and frills at the front that continue over the shoulders to the back.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Wide T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Wide T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.

Short dress in airy, crinkled, patterned chiffon with a rounded collar and button placket. Pin-tucks and frills at the front and long sleeves with frill trims at the shoulders and cuffs. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a gently flared, lined skirt.

Short dress in airy, crinkled, patterned chiffon with a rounded collar and button placket. Pin-tucks and frills at the front and long sleeves with frill trims at the shoulders and cuffs. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a gently flared, lined skirt.

Short dress in airy, crinkled, patterned chiffon with a rounded collar and button placket. Pin-tucks and frills at the front and long sleeves with frill trims at the shoulders and cuffs. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a gently flared, lined skirt.

Short dress in airy, crinkled, patterned chiffon with a rounded collar and button placket. Pin-tucks and frills at the front and long sleeves with frill trims at the shoulders and cuffs. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a gently flared, lined skirt.

Short, wrapover dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, concealed press-stud at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce and sewn-on bow. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, a gently flared skirt and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short, wrapover dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, concealed press-stud at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce and sewn-on bow. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, a gently flared skirt and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short, wrapover dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, concealed press-stud at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce and sewn-on bow. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, a gently flared skirt and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short, wrapover dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, concealed press-stud at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce and sewn-on bow. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, a gently flared skirt and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short, wrapover dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, concealed press-stud at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce and sewn-on bow. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, a gently flared skirt and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short, wrapover dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, concealed press-stud at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce and sewn-on bow. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, a gently flared skirt and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Fabric patch with embroidered text. Size approx. 5x3.5 cm.

Boots in grained imitation leather with a sewn-in foldover pile edge at the top, zip in the side and adjustable tab with metal buckle at the front. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.

Boots in grained imitation leather with a sewn-in foldover pile edge at the top, zip in the side and adjustable tab with metal buckle at the front. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Wide trousers in wide wale cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, coin pocket at the front and fake welt back pockets. Straight-cut, ankle-length legs with creases.

Short dress in chiffon crêpe with inset lace trims, an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with flounces at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Short dress in chiffon crêpe with inset lace trims, an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with flounces at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Short jersey dress with a V-neck that has decorative ties at the front. Short sleeves and a flounced seam at the shoulders and waist. Unlined.

Calf-length, straight-cut dress in a cotton and linen blend with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist and short slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved top in satin with a lace yoke and round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved top in satin with a lace yoke and round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
Double-layered hat in cotton jersey with a heart-shaped motif on the front in reversible sequins.
Trainers in slub-weave cotton with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
